bibl.title: New Documentary Papyri from the Polish Excavations at Deir el-Naqlun (P. Naqlun 35-38).
bibl.note: The four documents published here were found in 2011 on the plateau at the monastic site of Deir el-Naqlun: - 35. P. Naqlun Inv. 11.255. Fragment of a letter to a bishop; - 36. Inv. 11.375. List of names; - 37. Inv. 11.379. Left-hand side of a letter; - 38. Inv. 11.389. Right-hand side of a letter concerning a loan (?). - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Tomasz Derda & Joanna Wegner, New Documentary Papyri from the Polish Excavations at Deir el-Naqlun (P. Naqlun 35-38).

The four documents published here were found in 2011 on the plateau at the monastic site of Deir el-Naqlun: - 35. P. Naqlun Inv. 11.255. Fragment of a letter to a bishop; - 36. Inv. 11.375. List of names; - 37. Inv. 11.379. Left-hand side of a letter; - 38. Inv. 11.389. Right-hand side of a letter concerning a loan (?). - Avec résumé en anglais.
